name: Doctor Larson's Death Gauntlet
description:
Doctor Larson is a real person. This is her story.

Actually, this retro maze eat-em-up is a gift for a friend of mine who wanted to be in a video game. Doctor Larson's Death Gauntlet is a challenging retro-styled eat-em-up appropriate for all ages, with plenty of edible enjoyment!

NOTE: if you feel the screen is too small, it can be maximized. Windows users, hold down ALT and press ENTER. I'm sure similar things can be done in various Windows emulator programs/shells, but I don't have 'em and can't help there.

DLDG is free to download and play, but if you liked it, please contribute! I had a blast creating this game for a friend, and want to continue to make enjoyable, easy-to-learn, and engaging games. Your donations will serve as an inspiration to me, and motivation to continue (not to mention, obvious financial support!).

Thanks!
